page.title: 03Glens Parish Church,Cortachy
page.content: Cortachy Church is one of the four churches of the Glen's Parish. The others are at Memus,Prosen and Clova.Services are held every Sunday at Cortachy and at Memus and Prosen on 2 Sundays a month.Clova Church is no longer used except for a midnight srrvice on Christmas Eve.The widely scattered congregation numbers 300. 7 children attend Sunday School at Cortachy and the minister officiates at approx.5 weddings and 5 christenings a year.This year 11 young communicants joined the church. Pastoral visits amount to 9000 miles of motoring a year.In addition he travels 34 miles a week to visit the schools at Cortachy,Prosen and Clova. On 8th July this year the minister will carry out the wishes of a young couple to be married on a hillside in Glen Doll.
